# a [[few]]; [[several]]; [[some]]

===Adverb===
{{zh-adv}}

# [[how many]]
#: {{zh-x|寶寶 '''幾個''' 月 會 爬？|At '''how many''' months can a baby crawl?}}

====Usage notes====
* Technically, 幾個 jǐgè should only be used with nouns that have [[個]] gè as a primary [[measure word]]. Moreoever, 幾個 jǐgè is only used when the answer to "[[how many]]?" is expected to be under ten. For amounts that are expected to exceed ten, [[多少]] duōshǎo is used.
